hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -f jenkins-cli.jar wget ${JENKINS_URL}/jnlpJars/jenkins-cli.jar #java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s ${JENKINS_URL} set-build-description ${JOB_NAME} ${BUILD_NUMBER} "Testing build" #java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s ${JENKINS_URL} set-build-display-name ${JOB_NAME} ${BUILD_NUMBER} "blah" #java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s ${JENKINS_URL} set-build-result aborted java -jar jenkins-cli.jar set-build-description ${JOB_NAME} ${BUILD_NUMBER} "Testing build" java -jar jenkins-cli.jar set-build-display-name ${JOB_NAME} ${BUILD_NUMBER} "blah" java -jar jenkins-cli.jar set-build-result aborted echo hi
